entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Flurries early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
